hero.tagline: A place to wake up. Or slow down. Ideally both.
hero.taglineAlt: Quiet mornings. Loud laughs. Coffee in between.
hero.subtitle: Specialty Coffee, Breakfast & Brunch â€” S'AgarÃ³, Costa Brava

producers.title: Our Producers
producers.intro: Coffee, matcha, bread, eggs â€” every product has a story. We only work with those who share our obsession for doing things right.

questions.reservationAnswer: We don't take reservations â€” we believe in spontaneous brunch. But don't worry, turnover is quick and we always find a spot. Weekends before 10am are usually quieter.
questions.wifiAnswer: Yes, free and fast. Perfect for getting some work done â€” but your laptop comes with a coffee, right? ðŸ˜‰
questions.dogsAnswer: Absolutely! Dogs are welcome both inside and on the terrace. We always have fresh water for them.
questions.parkingAnswer: Yes, free parking right next to the venue. There's also blue zone parking nearby if it's full.
questions.eventsAnswer: Yes, for small groups outside regular hours. Email us at hola@dirtyrabbit.es with your idea and let's see how we can make magic.
questions.dietaryAnswer: Yes. Vegetarian and vegan options on the menu, plant-based milks available. For gluten-free, ask â€” we have several options but the kitchen isn't 100% gluten-free.
questions.specialty: What is specialty coffee and why do you use it?
questions.specialtyAnswer: It's genuinely good coffee â€” grown with care, roasted in small batches, and tastes like more than just 'coffee'. Notes of fruit, chocolate, flowers... things you wouldn't expect. We work with La Cabra from Copenhagen because they roast light and respect the bean. The result? Coffee that doesn't need sugar to taste good. Try it and let us know.
questions.coffeeOrigin: Where does your coffee come from?
questions.coffeeOriginAnswer: Our espresso is from La Cabra (Copenhagen) with Ethiopian beans. Batch brew changes seasonally â€” currently Honduras. Decaf is from Puchero. Every origin is chosen for flavor profile, not price.
questions.decafAnswer: Yes, from Puchero. And the best part: it's free. We don't charge extra for decaf because everyone deserves good coffee, with or without caffeine.
questions.kidsAnswer: 100%. We have a high chair, changing table, and a terrace where kids can move around. The Rabbit Power smoothie is their favorite. Families are part of our community.
questions.terraceAnswer: Yes, cozy outdoor terrace with shade. It faces the street, no views â€” but it's quiet and perfect for breakfast. In summer it's the favorite spot.
questions.location: How do I get there from Sant Pol Beach?
questions.locationAnswer: We're a 5-minute walk from Sant Pol, heading up Avinguda de Platja d'Aro. After a swim, an ice cream or iced latte hits the spot.
questions.camiRonda: Are you close to the CamÃ­ de Ronda?
questions.camiRondaAnswer: 3 minutes from the coastal path. Many hikers stop here before or after their route. The large batch brew is perfect for recharging.
questions.groups: Do you have space for groups?
questions.groupsAnswer: For groups up to 8, yes. Larger groups are difficult without booking. For private events outside hours, email us.
questions.takeawayAnswer: Yes, everything. Coffee, smoothies, toasts... We use sustainable packaging. Perfect for taking to the beach.
questions.paymentAnswer: Yes, card, cash, and mobile payment. Whatever works for you.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.intro: Everything you need to know before visiting. If you can't find your answer, get in touch.

howItStarted.title: How It Started
howItStarted.text: Looking for a place we actually wanted to have breakfast in S'AgarÃ³, we couldn't find one. So Iwonka decided to open this place. A cafÃ© where the coffee is actually good, where the food is made with care, and where you can stay as long as you want without anyone watching the clock.

whySagaro.title: Why S'AgarÃ³
whySagaro.text: We wanted a place with sun, sea, and a real community. S'AgarÃ³ won us over from the first walk along the coast. It's the perfect balance: quiet in winter, lively in summer, and always with that Mediterranean light that changes everything.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.text: We don't chase trends or try to reinvent anything. We simply do things with care. Good ingredients, honest technique, and the time each thing needs. That simple.

theName.title: The Name
theName.text: Why Dirty Rabbit? Because rabbits are curious, quick, and a bit mischievous. And the 'dirty' part... because the best coffee always leaves a mark.

wildComfort.title: Wild Comfort
wildComfort.text: The balance between energy and calm. We're not a quiet cafÃ© or a chaotic one. We're both.

belonging.title: Belonging
belonging.text: Customers who become friends. A place where everyone fits without forcing it.

intentional.title: Intentional
intentional.text: Every choice has purpose. La Cabra, REQ, Awachai â€” chosen with intention.
